title: [BUG] Another build error in Windows 10 host, VS 2019 Community Edition (Preview)
body:
**Have clang installed by VS 2010 CE Installer**
And the location is
C:\Program Files (x86)\Microsoft Visual Studio\2019\Preview\VC\Tools\Llvm\bin\clang-cl.exe

**Error Message**
[12/1101] compile ../../../src/xamarin/SkManagedDrawable.cpp
FAILED: obj/src/xamarin/libSkiaSharp.SkManagedDrawable.obj
cmd /c set __VSCMD_ARG_NO_LOGO=1 && set VSCMD_START_DIR=%CD% && "/Auxiliary/Build/vcvarsall.bat" amd64 10.0.18362.0 -vcvars_ver=14.2 &&   "C:/Program Files/LLVM/bin/clang-cl.exe" /nologo /showIncludes /FC -DSKIA_C_DLL -D_CRT_SECURE_NO_WARNINGS -D_HAS_EXCEPTIONS=0 -DWIN32_LEAN_AND_MEAN -DNOMINMAX -DNDEBUG -DSK_GAMMA_APPLY_TO_A8 -DSKIA_IMPLEMENTATION=1 -DSK_GL -DSK_VULKAN -DSK_SUPPORT_PDF -DSK_HAS_JPEG_LIBRARY -DSK_USE_LIBGIFCODEC -DSK_HAS_PNG_LIBRARY -DSK_CODEC_DECODES_RAW -DSK_HAS_WEBP_LIBRARY -DSK_XML -I../../.. -I../../.. -I../../../third_party/externals/libgifcodec /bigobj /utf-8 -fms-compatibility-version=19 -imsvc /Tools/MSVC//include -imsvc "C:\Program Files (x86)\Windows Kits\10/Include/10.0.18362.0/shared" -imsvc "C:\Program Files (x86)\Windows Kits\10/Include/10.0.18362.0/ucrt" -imsvc "C:\Program Files (x86)\Windows Kits\10/Include/10.0.18362.0/um" -imsvc "C:\Program Files (x86)\Windows Kits\10/Include/10.0.18362.0/winrt" /O2 /Zc:inline -Wno-unused-parameter -DSKIA_C_DLL /MT /EHsc /Z7 -D_HAS_AUTO_PTR_ETC=1 -DSK_BUILD_FOR_NANOSERVER  /std:c++17 /GR- /c ../../../src/xamarin/SkManagedDrawable.cpp /Foobj/src/xamarin/libSkiaSharp.SkManagedDrawable.obj /Fd"obj/SkiaSharp_c.pdb"
The system cannot find the path specified.
[14/1101] stamp obj/fontmgr_custom_empty.stamp
ninja: build stopped: subcommand failed.
An error occurred when executing task 'libSkiaSharp'.
Error: One or more errors occurred.
        Process 'C:/MyDevProjects/MyGitHub/SkiaSharp/externals/depot_tools/ninja.exe' failed with error: 1
An error occurred when executing task 'libSkiaSharp'.
Error: One or more errors occurred.
        Cake: Process returned an error (exit code 1).
An error occurred when executing task 'externals-nanoserver'.
Error: One or more errors occurred.
        Cake: Process returned an error (exit code 1).
PS C:\MyDevProjects\MyGitHub\SkiaSharp>
